channel.title: Skyline-Park on Srikanth Perinkulam
channel.description: Recent content in Skyline-Park on Srikanth Perinkulam

item.title: Chance encounters
item.description:
Came across this ‘freshly’ made trail in Skyline Park yesterday. I’ve been to this small park quite a few times but never quite spotted this ’extension’. Should get back here sometime soon to explore further!

Yet another find off the blue that makes me love Boston all the more!

item.title: Week15Day1 - Caught running
item.description: Great evening out with Miss Me. Short but fun run/bike ride to Skyline park and back. Need to explore the blocked road next time. Feels like summer with temps soaring to the 80s!
